info.title: aurorachat for Wii U
info.author: Funtum
info.details:
A chatting application originally for the Nintendo 3DS and 2DS systems, now on Wii U.

To use the app, create an account or log in to an existing one.
Users can send and receive real-time messages online. All messages are moderated, and users are expected to follow the rules. The Code of Conduct is available in the GitHub repository.

changelog:
v0.0.5.2
This release brings new formatting to the versioning to coincide with the 3DS client (v0.5.2 instead of v0.0.5.2).

 What's new
- Fixed several issues that caused the login to fail.- If you still have issues signing up or logging in, it should now display more information regarding why it failed.
- Chat is now scrollable with the D-PAD.
- Added themes from aurorachat on 3DS.- You can also reverse the themes, swapping the colors with the TV and GamePad.
- You can now view the rules by pressing the Y button when chatting.[^1]- There's also a QR Code for the Unitendo Discord server on the last page.
- Just like the 3DS and Wii, the Wii U now sends a tag showing the console you are on.
